titleStmt.title: Equity and Criminal Court in the Fourth Judicial District

availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

org.orgName: Equity and Criminal Court in the Fourth Judicial District

body.p: Equity and Criminal Court for the entire 4th Judicial District of the Commonwealth of Kentucky. Judge(s): John W. Ritter.

ab.bibl:
"An Act to Amend an act, entitled 'An act to establish an Equity and Criminal Court in the fourth Judicial District'," Acts of the General Assembly of the Commonwealth of Kentucky, vol. 1 (Frankfort, Ky.: George D. Prentice, State Printer, 1860), 59.
KYR-0001-031-0010.
